entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
